name: M's Cases
description:
A super short game about a Cat Detective we made for fun. Enjoys!

How to Play
  • Left click to move and interact with objects
  • Combine and use items to solve the puzzle 
Credits
  • Art by Thanh Do
  • Developed by Vinh Pham
  • Scripts by Tuan Do
  • Music by John Bartmann (https://johnbartmann.com)
  • Sound by https://freesound.org/
